text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz à <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden à <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfänge der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> à <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1. Fixed nested BIBL tag structure: "Memoires de Rochester" was missing a closing tag, causing "Maupertuis" entry to be incorrectly nested inside it. Added proper closing </BIBL> tag.
2. Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry for consistency with other entries.
3. Normalized corrupted Unicode characters representing German special characters and formatting:
   - "√ü" → "ß" (eszett/sharp s)
   - "√§" → "ä" (a-umlaut)
   - "√º" → "ü" (u-umlaut)
   - "√†" → "à" (a with grave accent, used for "à" meaning "at/for")
4. Normalized format abbreviations: "8v√≤" → "8vo." (octavo format)
5. Fixed "groß 8vo." format specification.
6. Corrected German words: "Anfänge" and "Würmen" with proper umlauts."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz à <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden à <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfänge der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> à <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Fixed nested BIBL tag structure: "Memoires de Rochester" was missing a closing tag, causing "Maupertuis" entry to be incorrectly nested inside it. Added proper closing </BIBL> tag.
2. Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry for consistency with other entries.
3. Normalized corrupted Unicode characters representing German special characters and formatting:
   - "√ü" → "ß" (eszett/sharp s)
   - "√§" → "ä" (a-umlaut)
   - "√º" → "ü" (u-umlaut)
   - "√†" → "à" (a with grave accent, used for "à" meaning "at/for")
4. Normalized format abbreviations: "8v√≤" → "8vo." (octavo format)
5. Fixed "groß 8vo." format specification.
6. Corrected German words: "Anfänge" and "Würmen" with proper umlauts.
